vsParam:
Sorel, Sorel!
[px] has fixed the vase for you.

Phew... Thank you, I am saved.
Now I just need to put the vase back to where it was...

Uh! Majorum Sensei!?
Hmm, er, I can explain...

Are you alright, Sorel!? Did you get hurt!?
Did the pieces cut you!?

There are some remaining pieces on the floor!
Hang on, let me clean that up with wizardry!

Calm down! Don't get too excited, sensei!
She's not hurt, calm down!

Is that so? That's good.
You must be careful, do you understand?

The vase can be fixed...
But it will be terrible if Sorel or you guys get hurt...

... Okay.
I'll be careful next time...

Hehe, it's good that you can reflect on that!
I have a lesson now, please excuse me! Bye, guys!
Anyway... This incident comes to a conclusion.

Yes...
Thank you, [px]. I am glad you are here.

Oh, you are lucky that Majorum Sensei found it.
If it were Bergamot Sensei...
Ha-ha, I am terrified just by thinking about it...

No matter how finds it...
This is completely my fault.

Guys, I am sorry!
Sorry to trouble you!

Ha-ha, it's alright.
It's just, we didn't get to watch your singing and dancing.

Hmm, maybe next time...
But, I get to see the power of alchemy, once again...

I never imagined that it could fix the shattered vase.
I'll work hard and use wizardry for the same purpose one day...

Hmm... I think Sorel has something idea again.
Let's hope nothing bad happens...
